  簡歷 RESUME
⋅ ⋅ ⋅ ⋅

Lucas Li 李立

March 11 / Pisces 3月11日 / 雙魚座

  Competition Manager at Solar Decathlon China 中國國際太陽能十項全能競賽 競賽主管
  Lives in Beijing, China 居住於 中國北京
  From Honghe Hani and Yi Autonomous Prefecture 來自於 紅河哈尼族彞族自治州
  Studied Architectural Engineering at Purdue University 就讀於 普渡大學 建築工程
  Studied Bldg Environment & Facilities Engineering at Tongji University 就讀於 同濟大學 建築環境與設備工程

  簡歷 RESUME   ⋅ ⋅ ⋅ ⋅
